channel.title: business development on Maximilian Holzmüller
channel.description: Recent content in business development on Maximilian Holzmüller

item.title: Work Experience
item.description: University of Arkansas at Little Rock Research Assistant Department of Finance and Economics December 2020 - current Assisting Economics and Finance Department in research projects. Job function includes reading and analyzing of academic articles and papers, data collection, cleaning, and analysis. Other responsibilities entail proofreading, editing, and contributing to academic research. Currently working on a public health journal article to investigate the seasonality of depression under the influence of COVID-19.
